JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Would you like to be a part of an international concept business with more than 100 years of history, where design and exceptional customer service are in focus? Georg Jensen is currently looking for a Sales Associate, preferably with experience selling jewellery.

Do you have experience delivering unrivalled customer service? Do you have excellent Danish & English language skills? Would you like to be a part of a premium brand, with a strong heritage and a proud tradition of craftsmanship? Last, but not least, are you a passionate retailer? Then you might just be the Sales Associate that Georg Jensen is looking for. The weekly hours will be 37 hours, which includes weekend shifts every other weekend.

Your key responsibilities:
  • Ensuring professional and unique customer experience  
  • Focus on agreed deliverables by the Store Manager in order to achieve the required financial results
  • Be responsible together with a team of sales associates for sales & service; inventory; visual merchandising, and achievement of desired financial results
  • Reflect the leading and trend-setting brand in order to delight and surprise the customers
The ideal candidate has the following competences:
  • Minimum one-year experience from a similar position
  • Experience with other luxury brands
  • High proficiency in Danish
  • Basic computer skills
Your profile being:
  • A background in retail
  • Motivated by sales and performance
  • Extremely service minded
  • A team player
  • Fast learner, proactive, result oriented and a self-starter
  • Is well groomed, well-spoken and well mannered, while being able to apply luxury behaviour and standards to all activities in the store
  • Is energetic, enthusiastic and positive
  • Is outgoing, hardworking and responsible
Your application
No need to send a cover letter but your resumé must be submitted no later than May 15, 2022. We will be performing interviews ongoing in the process and look to fill the position as soon as possible. Therefore, we recommend that you apply sooner rather than later. We look forward to hearing from you.

Further information
For further information regarding the position, please contact Aisha Raja at aisha.raja@georgjensen.com. We also recommend that you visit our website at www.georgjensen.com.    

Work location:
Amagertorv 4, 1160 København K

Georg Jensen is a Danish design house renowned for its timeless Danish aesthetics, superior craftsmanship and visionary collaborations with leading artists and designers. Founded in Copenhagen in 1904 by master silversmith Georg Jensen, the company creates products ranging from jewellery, watches and homeware to silver hollowware and Christmas Collectables.
We pride ourselves on our more than 1.300 highly skilled, service minded and passionate employees, stationed both at our Headquarter in Copenhagen, Denmark and throughout our global presence with 10 international subsidiaries, representing close to 100 stores and 2.000 wholesale accounts globally.
